attributes.action: Reduce the price to travel around the country on Various train systems and undergrounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I travel from Chatham to London and from London to Chatham weekdays for work, not only does it cost me over £28 per day (which has just gone up again) I am forced to stand compacted in the gangway due to the fact that their are too many people on the train (or not enough carriages) I have this problem on the London underground too.. Whenever you speak to the manager of a station the response is the same, the price goes up because our service has. I find that hard to believe as I am still standing everyday, the carriages still smell and the staff are still rude. I think the cost of travel should be reduced to warrant the level of service we receive. Or at least up the level of service, something that is noticeable to everyone else other than the guys counting the hundreds of thousands of pounds profit you make...
